-- Database: to-do-list

-- DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS "to-do-list";

CREATE DATABASE "to-do-list"
    WITH 
    OWNER = postgres
    ENCODING = 'UTF8'
    LC_COLLATE = 'Portuguese_Brazil.1252'
    LC_CTYPE = 'Portuguese_Brazil.1252'
    TABLESPACE = pg_default
    CONNECTION LIMIT = -1;

    -- Table: public.lista

-- DROP TABLE IF EXISTS public.lista;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.lista
(
    "idTask" smallint NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 32767 CACHE 1 ),
    "dsTask" character varying(50) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    "statusTask" "char" NOT NULL DEFAULT 'A'::"char",
    CONSTRAINT "TaskList_pkey" PRIMARY KEY ("idTask")
)

TABLESPACE pg_default;

ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public.lista
    OWNER to postgres;
